sentences.english: They could even count the fruit in Soviet orchards and analyze their crops.
sentences.chinese: 他們甚至可以數出蘇聯果園裏的果樹並分析其產量。

sentences.english: Even in time of danger, many times in body armor.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在危險時刻，多次以身相護。

sentences.english: We might even see-saw between both counterproductive poles.
sentences.chinese: 我們甚至可能看到雙方針鋒相對的情況。

sentences.english: The system can even be used to spot rip currents in real time.
sentences.chinese: 這個系統甚至可以捕捉到實時的海流活動。

sentences.english: It has multiple regions that include dozens if not hundreds of branches.
sentences.chinese: 它遍及多個區域，每個區域包括幾十甚至上百家支行。

sentences.english: Will governments in the region maintain and even increase state ownership of financial institutions?
sentences.chinese: 這些地區的政府會保持甚至增容其國有金融機構嗎？

sentences.english: He even calls her by a cute nickname, "Snips."
sentences.chinese: 他甚至用一個可愛的暱稱，“小鬼頭”來叫她。

sentences.english: I could literally count the patches on the ripstop nylon.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至能夠精確地數清防刮尼龍傘上的補丁。

sentences.english: Some groups even fought one another.
sentences.chinese: 一些組織甚至自相殘殺。

sentences.english: Or maybe I don't even remember that I was alive.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可能連活着都不記得。
她甚至可能會養一隻寵物鳥。

sentences.english: I felt uncomfortable, and even afraid, of going out by myself.
sentences.chinese: 我很是不爽，甚至都害怕自個兒出去買東西了。

sentences.english: You find it difficult to get things done or even at least get through the day.
sentences.chinese: 你會感覺很難把事情做好，甚至度日如年。

sentences.english: Pod transport technology is even starting gain some stateside attention.
sentences.chinese: 豆莢車運輸技術甚至引起了美國的關注。

sentences.english: Even the consequences of glacier retreat are poorly understood.
sentences.chinese: 人們甚至對冰川退縮的後果也不太清楚。

definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
